_schema: Projects organized by category. Categories: systems, ml, web, tools, ai

projects.title: Prometheus AI Infrastructure
projects.description: A comprehensive personal AI infrastructure built on Claude Code. Features 30+ custom skills spanning investigative journalism, government data analysis, self-optimization, and dynamic agent orchestration. Includes hooks for session management, memory systems, and bidirectional Notion integration.
projects.narrative: Fardin's vision of personal AI taken to its logical conclusion—an ever-evolving system that learns, adapts, and operates as a true digital extension of its creator.

projects.title: VerseCraft Health
projects.description: Healthcare SaaS platform for Early Intervention providers. Full-stack monorepo with mobile app, API, and admin dashboard. Built to simplify clinical documentation, scheduling, and billing for therapists serving children 0-3.
projects.narrative: Fardin's current startup. Every layer—from database schema to pitch deck—crafted with the intent of solving a real problem for therapists who serve the most vulnerable patients.

projects.title: LocalElo
projects.description: Multi-organization Elo ranking platform for martial arts academies and competitive communities. Real-time leaderboards, match logging, and athlete performance dashboards with historical Elo visualization.
projects.narrative: Born from Fardin's BJJ training—the question of 'who's actually better?' deserved a real answer. This is Chess.com for the mats.

projects.title: Dynamic Memory Allocator
projects.description: A secure, high-performance malloc() implementation for x86-64. Features segregated free lists, quick lists, block coalescing, and obfuscated headers to detect heap corruption.
projects.narrative: Built my own malloc/free/realloc from scratch. This taught me more about memory management than any textbook could.

projects.title: Concurrent Network Game Server
projects.description: Multi-threaded C server for a real-time maze game. Handles concurrent connections with POSIX threads, custom binary protocols, and synchronized game state.
projects.narrative: Real-time multiplayer requires precise synchronization. This server handles multiple clients without race conditions.

projects.title: POSIX Print Spooler
projects.description: A complete print spooler with job queuing, dynamic printer management, signal handling, and conversion pipelines.

projects.title: OpenStreetMap PBF Parser
projects.description: Systems-level parser for OpenStreetMap .pbf files. Custom Protocol Buffers deserializer with no third-party libs.

projects.title: HTTP Server & Proxy
projects.description: Built an HTTP/1.1 web server and caching proxy from scratch. Handles concurrent requests and caches responses.

projects.title: TCP Flow Analysis Tool
projects.description: Network packet analyzer for TCP flows. Parses pcap files, reconstructs streams, and visualizes connection patterns.

projects.title: Box Office Revenue Predictor
projects.description: ML pipeline to predict movie revenue using TMDB 5000 dataset. Includes EDA, feature engineering, and comparison of Linear, KNN, and Random Forest regressors.
projects.narrative: Can we predict if a movie will be a hit? Turns out budget, cast popularity, and release timing matter most.

projects.title: Energy Demand Forecasting
projects.description: Weather-driven residential energy modeling. Built data pipelines, trained regression models, and profiled appliance load patterns.

projects.title: NYC Airbnb Market Analysis
projects.description: Deep-dive analysis of NYC Airbnb listings. Data cleaning, correlation analysis, and strategic insights for pricing.

projects.title: Exoplanet Spectrum Analyzer
projects.description: 3D visualization tool for James Webb Space Telescope FITS data. Interactive plots for analyzing spectral patterns in exoplanet observations.
projects.narrative: Processing real astronomical data from JWST to visualize what distant worlds might look like.

projects.title: FairShare
projects.description: Splitwise-style expense sharing app. Group finance management with secure auth, real-time balance tracking, and smart settlement suggestions.
projects.narrative: Built for my roommates who were tired of Venmo requests. Now we actually know who owes what.

projects.title: MindMesh AI
projects.description: AI-powered brainstorming companion. Expand ideas through intelligent mind mapping with GPT integration and interactive visualizations.

projects.title: Reddit Clone
projects.description: Full-featured social platform with real-time updates, JWT auth, nested comment threading, and upvote/downvote mechanics.

projects.title: VerseCraft
projects.description: A literary platform for poetry with a sophisticated New Yorker-inspired aesthetic. Features smooth animations with Framer Motion, real-time interactions via Supabase, and a minimalist design system honoring the written word.
projects.narrative: Where code meets literature. Fardin built VerseCraft to prove that web applications can be as thoughtfully composed as the poetry they display.

projects.title: BigMinds Email Processor
projects.description: AI-powered email-to-Excel processor using Google Gemini API. Extracts structured child and case data from unstructured emails for healthcare Early Intervention workflows. Features intelligent parsing, SharePoint integration, and comprehensive statistics tracking.
projects.narrative: Automation that matters. This tool saves hours of manual data entry for therapists, letting them focus on what actually helps children.

projects.title: SAM - Stony Brook Academics Manager
projects.description: Comprehensive academic lifecycle management platform built for CSE 416. Handles course registration, degree requirements tracking, waitlists, audit logs, and academic planning with concept-driven architecture inspired by 'The Essence of Software'.
projects.narrative: A team capstone project that taught Fardin as much about collaboration as it did about building complex systems.

projects.title: RoomMatch
projects.description: Tinder-style roommate matching app. Swipe through potential roommates, match based on lifestyle compatibility, chat in-app.

projects.title: Computational Geometry Visualizer
projects.description: Interactive tool for visualizing geometric algorithms - convex hulls, Voronoi diagrams, Delaunay triangulation.

projects.title: Cold Caller
projects.description: Android app for teachers to randomly call on students. Tracks participation, manages class sessions.

projects.title: Trading Simulator
projects.description: Paper trading platform with real market data. Practice strategies without risking real money.
